an2.77:1.1: “Sanimitta, bhikkhave, uppajjanti papaka akusala dhamma, no animitta.
an2.77:1.2: Tasseva nimittassa pahana evam te papaka akusala dhamma na honti”ti.
an2.78:1.1: “Sanidana, bhikkhave, uppajjanti papaka akusala dhamma, no anidana.
an2.78:1.2: Tasseva nidanassa pahana evam te papaka akusala dhamma na honti”ti.
an2.79:1.1: “Sahetuka, bhikkhave, uppajjanti papaka akusala dhamma, no ahetuka.
an2.79:1.2: Tasseva hetussa pahana evam te papaka akusala dhamma na honti”ti.
an2.80:1.1: “Sasankhara, bhikkhave, uppajjanti papaka akusala dhamma, no asankhara.
an2.80:1.2: Tesamyeva sankharanam pahana evam te papaka akusala dhamma na honti”ti.
an2.81:1.1: “Sappaccaya, bhikkhave, uppajjanti papaka akusala dhamma, no appaccaya.
an2.81:1.2: Tasseva paccayassa pahana evam te papaka akusala dhamma na honti”ti.
an2.82:1.1: “Sarupa, bhikkhave, uppajjanti papaka akusala dhamma, no arupa.
an2.82:1.2: Tasseva rupassa pahana evam te papaka akusala dhamma na honti”ti.
an2.83:1.1: “Savedana, bhikkhave, uppajjanti papaka akusala dhamma, no avedana.
an2.83:1.2: Tassayeva vedanaya pahana evam te papaka akusala dhamma na honti”ti.
an2.84:1.1: “Sasanna, bhikkhave, uppajjanti papaka akusala dhamma, no asanna.
an2.84:1.2: Tassayeva sannaya pahana evam te papaka akusala dhamma na honti”ti.
an2.85:1.1: “Savinnana, bhikkhave, uppajjanti papaka akusala dhamma, no avinnana.
an2.85:1.2: Tasseva vinnanassa pahana evam te papaka akusala dhamma na honti”ti.
an2.86:1.1: “Sankhatarammana, bhikkhave, uppajjanti papaka akusala dhamma, no asankhatarammana.
an2.86:1.2: Tasseva sankhatassa pahana evam te papaka akusala dhamma na honti”ti.
